title: GoHighLevel (GHL) Support Specialist – Troubleshooting & Customer Success | $10/hr
job_overview:
Are you a GoHighLevel (GHL) expert with a passion for problem-solving and helping businesses succeed? We’re looking for a highly skilled GHL Support Specialist to join our fast-growing SaaS company, Enrollio, and provide top-tier customer support and troubleshooting assistance.

What You'll Do:

Troubleshoot and resolve GHL account issues for our clients
Provide responsive and professional customer support via chat, email, and calls
Assist clients with automations, workflows, integrations, and campaign setups
Identify recurring issues and suggest improvements for our processes
Collaborate with our team to enhance the customer experience

Requirements:

Proven expertise in GoHighLevel – deep understanding of workflows, triggers, campaigns, and integrations
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot technical issues
Excellent English communication skills (written & spoken)
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks efficiently
Must be based in the Philippines
Availability to work full-time, 9 AM - 5 PM EST (Monday-Friday)

Important:

To be considered, you MUST submit a video with your application showcasing your GHL expertise – walk us through a workflow you’ve built, a tricky automation you’ve solved, or any other GHL-related challenge you’ve conquered!

Starting Rate: $10/hour
Schedule: Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM EST
Location: Remote (Philippines-based)

If you're ready to take on this exciting role and help dance studios optimize their businesses with GHL, apply now!
